name: Kiffgo
slogan: Book a delivery van in a click
description: Make it simple to send reliably anything anywhere

team.name: bernard sivert
team.bioHtml:
Cofounder @ Kiffgo
Love to automate boring stuff with python, Machine learning and A.I. 
Launched a business when he was a student. Revenue: €464k

jobs.title: Customers Service / Operations
jobs.description:
Are you a college or school leaver ? You are  energetic, result-oriented, curious and want to engage in a learning environment and probably isn't exam oriented. 
You want to enter the working world, work hard, grow and build a career.  
This a huge learning opportunity for the right fit.
Kiffgo is looking for a full-time person who wants to learn about operational process, customer services, e-commerce, logistics and delivering a great experience. 

Logistics is the life blood of commerce. 
No goods can be at the right place without the help of logistics & transportation. #ecommerce #commerce #faster #curious #problems #career #delivery #workhard #engage

Kiffgo is a building the next generation logistics and delivery network. Enabling you get delivered any bulky items or furnitures faster than ever. 

Areas you will work on:
Enjoying talking to customers and collecting feedbacks
Help improving the product 
Solve customer problems
participate in UX/UI sprints
Customer orientation and ability to adapt/respond to different types of characters
Excellent communication and presentation skills

Want to join ? email us hr@kiffgo.io
